channel.title: errors on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in errors on C'est la Z

item.title: Subtle Errors
item.description: The semesters back up in full swing again - teaching 2 undergrad classes in person - CS0 in Python and CS1 in C++ along with my teacher certification class - Ethics via Zoom. Grand total of about 125 students. An error came up in the CS0 class the other day that reminded me how tough it is not only to prepare students to deal with all the things that can go wrong when learning to program but even for a teacher to realize what's going on.
